textAfterTable: Details book by: Mar 14, 2014 travel dates: Through Dec 31, 2012 minimum nights required: 4 source: marriott.com Description Book this resort’s ‘Fun Activity’ package and get a choice of activities with a 4-night stay. This package includes: Accommodations Choice of activities (choose from two catamaran sailing tickets, a $75 dining credit to Azul, a $75 dining credit to Roy’s or two 20-minute massages at Spa by the Sea) Promotional code NCL tags: Adventure Beach This deal was published on marriott.com with a starting price, which means that rates begin at the price listed but may be higher depending on your dates of travel. ×
